official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to authorize the Administrator to provide respite care to chronically ill service-connected disabled veterans on a three-year pilot test basis.

summary.text: Authorizes the Administrator of Veterans Affairs to conduct a pilot program during FY 1986 through 1988 to: (1) furnish respite care in Veterans Administration facilities to chronically ill service-connected disabled veterans; and (2) evaluate the medical advantages and cost-effectiveness of furnishing such respite care.
